description: A large plaza on Fish-Man Island where the major battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and the New Fish-Man Pirates takes place. This is where the Straw Hats demonstrate their post-timeskip abilities.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Begin Their Assault
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates launch their coordinated assault against the New Fish-Man Pirates in Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Main battleground for showcasing post-timeskip abilities.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Kokujo O Tatsumaki
keyEvents.description: Zoro unleashes his devastating Great Dragon Twister technique in the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: First major display of enhanced post-timeskip sword techniques.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Sky Walk
keyEvents.description: Sanji demonstrates his Sky Walk ability in the plaza while fighting the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad.
keyEvents.significance: First display of Sanji's aerial mobility.

statusHistory.reason: Main battleground during Fish-Man Island arc

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. Home to fish-men and merfolk, and the setting for the major conflict between the Straw Hats and New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Major Battle in Progress
keyEvents.description: The island hosts the major battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Setting for the crew's post-timeskip power demonstration.

description: A gloomy island in the Grand Line where Dracule Mihawk resides. Location where Roronoa Zoro trained for two years during the timeskip.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Training Flashback
keyEvents.description: Flashback shows Zoro's intense training on Kuraigana Island with Mihawk.
keyEvents.significance: Provides context for Zoro's enhanced abilities and new techniques.

description: Also known as Kamabakka Kingdom, an island inhabited by okama (crossdressers/drag queens) led by Emporio Ivankov. Location where Sanji trained for two years during the timeskip.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Training Flashback
keyEvents.description: Extended flashback shows Sanji's training on Momoiro Island, constantly fleeing from okama which built his leg strength and led to Sky Walk.
keyEvents.significance: Provides context for Sanji's enhanced abilities, particularly Sky Walk and improved leg strength.
